code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Container,Button,Form,Alert}from'react-bootstrap';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AIAssistant=()=>{const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const handleAsk=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/ask',{query});setResponse(res.data.response);}catch(err){setResponse('Error getting response from AI assistant.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"AI Assistant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Ask the AI Assistant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"mt-3",onClick:handleAsk,children:"Ask"})]}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{variant:"info",className:"mt-3",children:response})]});};export default AIAssistant;
